metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17523 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: lilypond-invoke-editor in LilyPond 2.19.80 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which allows remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL, as demonstrated by a --proxy-pac-file argument.

criterions.comment: lilypond package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.18.2-12build1').
